extendedInfo.description: The original voice controlled talking camera. See http://saycheesecamera.com (First released Aug 10, 2011) Also check out our iPhone camera app. http://www.zazado.com Say Cheese is loaded with innovative voice recognition and response features.  This camera app is heavy on useful photographic tools, like a talking countdown timer, highest resolution settings of any camera app, stealth mode, live filters, batch uploading and GPS/Time stamping.  Includes on-board help and a free set of live frames. Serves as a framing provider for framing photos from other apps, including the default gallery. Comes with a built in corner store for getting more than the free frames.  Find the developer's blog here for the latest info: http://www.bestcameraapps.com Live plug-in frames and texture effects for augmented reality snap shots are very cool.  Examples include old retro frames, groovy frames, festive frames and surface texture frames. Live framed photos are fun to make and fun to share!  Snap your photos in six ways: 1) Normal Click that responds with voice according to settings 2) Long press for a quick snapshot and save 3) Ask the camera to take a picture 4) Stealth Mode 5) Shake & Snap Mode 6) Talking countdown timer (a big favorite).   Voice recognition does not clutter your camera with the big dialog visible in most voice recognition apps. Say Cheese Camera is loaded with cool features like the voice countdown timer and the stealth mode for taking secret photos.  Uploading to Facebook is a breeze with the multi-select background batch uploader.  Other features include a one touch zoom from anywhere preview of existing photos. Just long press and slide up and down on any photo to zoom in and out. Support for content handlers like Google Goggles and photo editing apps and emailing. There is Document scanning, image resolution settings, jpeg quality, auto save, voice pitch, flash controls, scene modes, effects, stealth mode, location stamping, Hardware button launching, and more. Immediate feedback forms make it easy to contact the developer right from your phone.  With Say Cheese, you will be surprised by the smiles you will attract from a talking camera.  Use the defaults or customize your own responses for insults and compliments. Have fun! The World is Smiling.

reviews.title: Awesome awesome awesome
reviews.comment: I finally figured out how to use it this is totally awesome you better pat yourself on the back give yourself free hip hip hooray take my hats off to you at once do an outstanding job and I\'ve only got that free app this is so awesome keep up the good work I\'d give it a 10 star
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Really enhances the inbuilt camera. Well done. GREAT app. Love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its marvelous. I am in love wit it.give you 5 stars
reviews.comment: Its marvelous. I am in love wit it.give you 5 stars
reviews.author: ibrah ibrahim

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Maybe I\'m easy to impress but I\'ve been through several camera apps and when it comes to function this one is hands down the best. High res shots, the monotone lady is hysterical even if you don\'t censor her, but most of all the voice commands are so awesome to have. Thanks!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s ok but needs improvement
reviews.comment: Its ok needs more setting s and easyer options  and voices are annoying thanks tho
reviews.author: james sear

reviews.title: Some of the features won\'t work
reviews.comment: On my Samsung Galaxy Nexus it won\'t let me look at the gallery and I can\'t use the live frames please fix this and it would be nice if you could make a setting where it automatically goes to the voice phrase I will definitely rate it 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bloody Brilliant
reviews.comment: very good no faults as of yet!! PERFECT!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice camera
reviews.comment: This app is the best from all camera apps. It helps you take pictures in the night cuz it enables my camera flash to work like a flashlight. Keep up the good work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very happy with this app
reviews.comment: I take lots of pictures of my show rabbits, and it can be difficult to keep the rabbit posed for a photo. I got a phone tripod mounting plate to hold my phone on the tripod. Then I installed this app so I can do hands-free photos. I can get my rabbit posed then say \"Cheese\" and get the picture. It does seem to be a bit of a problem if I am too far from the phone, so I am going to try this with my wireless mic. Also, I need to do some experimenting on how to get the focus properly adjusted. Altogether though, I am very pleased.
reviews.author: Lil Peck

reviews.title: Surprised
reviews.comment: This is a great app! I just bought the texture frames. You can see the frames on the viewport so you know exactly how to aim the camera.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AJKILLER
reviews.comment: Great for old and new to cameras voice recognition makes it easy a must have for FAMILY OF YOUNG AND OLD A LIKE.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: fantastic app..
reviews.comment: ...Does so many cool things!  I really like being able to take a picture by voice command...:)
reviews.author: John Bump

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Installed on galaxy ace 2 main reason was to use voice activation to take pictures of carp whilst night fishing.  Cant fault it. Ignore those idiots that are nit picking this app , pic quality is great even in pitch black. Voice activation is great ,just say commands clearly . If you own galaxy ace 2 you must get this app. Will download frames at some point,not because i need them but to support developer ..
reviews.author: chris VIKING

reviews.title: Keeps freezing up.
reviews.comment: Auto focus will not take pic. Time stamp gives wrong time. Can\'t manually adjust.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent idea but...
reviews.comment: Poor picture quality, especially when flash is on.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This app is pretty good so farrr!! It counts down for u if you wanna take body pics haha

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: I like this app but every time I take a picture it puts my motorola electrify in silent mode.  Please fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Desire S. After 7nos. Shots. Force closed. Error \"camera not available\" same error now with other camera apps.  :( Edit. Works great on my gS2 now
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Kinda cool; Not so practical
reviews.comment: Nice novelty, but controls are bulky for on the fly, controls are accessible, but not easy to adjust quickly.  A nice idea, allot of work went in, so cudos. I will check back with this, for updates, and am keeping.  But for every day use on  quick shots, not yet.
reviews.author: Ian James

reviews.title: Absolutely fabulous!!!!
reviews.comment: This has everything and more.   Brilliant. Whoever developed this really thought things through and came up with amazing  features.  Can\'t praise this enough.
reviews.author: A Google User
